backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking celebration modal requirements to MonthlyCompletionCelebrationModal.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose.
frontend/DEVELOPMENT.md: Developer guide explaining setup, local development, and deployment steps.
frontend/env.json: Runtime config defining the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and design token styles including theme variables and celebration modal styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing features and linking to development instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the GoalsDashboard page as the root component.
frontend/src/components/CenteredNotifica: Centered auto‑dismissing notification component with fade‑in animation.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyCompletio: Celebration modal showing confetti, headline, optional selfie upload, default image fallback, and badge overlay.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyProgressD: SVG donut chart showing monthly progress via circular stroke animation.
frontend/src/components/MonthSelectionMo: Modal for selecting a month using a grid of buttons with confirm and cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/YearlySummaryTab: Yearly summary table that calculates per‑month completion and triggers the celebration modal on 100% transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes related queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing; no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, components, utilities, and extensive OKLCH theme variables for light/dark mode styling.
frontend/src/lib/months.ts: Exports a constant list of month names and a Month type.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, wrapping App in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboard.tsx: Implements the main goals dashboard with predefined category cards, local state for goals, and UI for adding, editing, completing, and assigning months.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, theme extensions, OKLCH color variables, and custom animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Vite’s node-side files with ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variables, path aliases, a dev proxy, and build settings.
project_state.json: Stores metadata describing the project’s features, versions, and capabilities for build planning.
